EFDC Variables Dynamic Solutions International, LLC 1 Preface The variable lists used in EFDC model are presented in this book.
3 1-D Arays The following tables displays 1-D arrays in EFDC code. oned <- read_excel("data/2017-03-29-arrays-rearranged.xlsx", sheet = "1darray") DT::datatable(oned, rownames = F)
4 2-D Arrays twod <- read_excel("data/2017-03-29-arrays-rearranged.xlsx", sheet = "2darray") DT::datatable(twod, rownames = F)
5 3-D Arrays threed <- read_excel("data/2017-03-29-arrays-rearranged.xlsx", sheet = "3darray") DT::datatable(threed, rownames = F)

6 4-D Arrays fourd <- read_excel("data/2017-03-29-arrays-rearranged.xlsx", sheet = "4darray") DT::datatable(fourd[,-2], style = 'bootstrap', width = 1200, rownames = F) knitr::kable(fourd, format="html", pad=0) Name Type 1d 2d 3d 4d Description CSER REAL*4 1:NDCSER 1:KCM 1:NCSERM 1:NSTVM INPUT CONCENTRATION TIME SERIES DATA QCTL REAL*4 1:NDQCLT 1:NDQCLT2 1:KCM 1:NQCTTM NA RTXBSDB REAL*4 1:LCM 1:KBM 1:NSTVM 1:NTXM NA TOXPFB REAL*4 1:LCM 1:KBM 1:NSTVM 1:NTXM TOXIC PARTICULATE PHASE FRACTION IN BED TOXPFW REAL*4 1:LCM 1:KCM 1:NSTVM 1:NTXM TOXIC PARTICULATE PHASE FRACTION IN WATER COLUMN TXPFLPF REAL*4 1:LCM 1:KCM 1:NSTVM 1:NTXM LOW PASS FILTER OF TOXIC PARTICULATE FRACTION WQCSER REAL*4 1:NDWQCSR 1:KCM 1:NWQCSRM 1:NWQVM WATER QUALITY MODEL VARIABLE WQPSSER REAL*4 1:NDWQPSR 1:NWQVM 1:NWQPSR M WATER QUALITY MODEL VARIABLE
